China's 40th Antarctic expedition successfully concludes

(1)Antarctic  /ænˈtɑːktɪk/ adj. 南极的例句：The snow cruiser proved hopelessly unsuited to Antarctic conditions.事实证明雪地车根本不适合在南极地区使用

The icebreaker will be open to public for three days there.

China's polar icebreaking research vessel Xuelong (Snow Dragon) returned to Qingdao City, east China's Shandong Province on Wednesday morning, rounding off the country's 40th Antarctic(1) expedition.

(2)Municipality /mjuːˌnɪsɪˈpæləti/ n.自治市例句：1997-The Chinese city of Chongqing ( formerly Chunking) is upgraded to a centrally administered municipality.1997年的今天，中国重庆升为中央直辖的行政自治市。(3) nautical /ˈnɔːtɪkl/ adj.海上的，航海的例句：Track spacing adjust to 2 nautical miles.搜寻线间距已调到2海里。

Organized by the Ministry of Natural Resources, China's 40th Antarctic expedition set off from east China's Shanghai Municipality(2) on November 1, 2023. The expedition team, consisting of more than 460 members from over 80 institutions, traveled more than 30,000 nautical(3) miles during a roughly five-month voyage.

The Antarctic expedition was for the first time supported by three vessels- two polar icebreakers the Xuelong and the Xuelong-2, and a cargo ship named Tianhui.

The Xuelong 2 icebreaker arrived in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region on Monday, and will be open to the public till Friday.

News Abstract

4月10日，雪龙号船停靠山东青岛，标志着由自然资源部组织的中国第40次南极考察圆满结束。自然资源部与山东省人民政府将在青岛奥帆基地码头举行欢迎仪式并举办为期三天的开放日活动。
